mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monster (name, hp, attack, speed, skill_name, skill_power, skill_accuracy) VALUES (#{name}, #{hp}, #{attack}, #{speed}, #{skillName}, #{skillPower}, #{skillAccuracy})
mapper.update: UPDATE monster SET name = #{name}, hp = #{hp}, attack = #{attack}, speed = #{speed}, skill_name = #{skillName}, skill_power = #{skillPower}, skill_accuracy = #{skillAccuracy} WHERE id = #{id}
